OpenAI Blog.title: Pacific Northwest National Laboratory and OpenAI partner to accelerate federal permitting
OpenAI Blog.summary: OpenAI and Pacific Northwest National Laboratory introduce DraftNEPABench, a new benchmark evaluating how AI coding agents can accelerate federal permitting—showing potential to reduce NEPA drafting time by up to 15% and modernize infrastructure reviews.

OpenAI Blog.title: OpenAI Codex and Figma launch seamless code-to-design experience
OpenAI Blog.summary: OpenAI and Figma launch a new Codex integration that connects code and design, enabling teams to move between implementation and the Figma canvas to iterate and ship faster.

OpenAI Blog.title: Disrupting malicious uses of AI | February 2026
OpenAI Blog.summary: Our latest threat report examines how malicious actors combine AI models with websites and social platforms—and what it means for detection and defense.

OpenAI Blog.title: Arvind KC appointed Chief People Officer
OpenAI Blog.summary: OpenAI appoints Arvind KC as Chief People Officer to help scale the company, strengthen its culture, and lead how work evolves in the age of AI.

OpenAI Blog.title: Why we no longer evaluate SWE-bench Verified
OpenAI Blog.summary: SWE-bench Verified is increasingly contaminated and mismeasures frontier coding progress. Our analysis shows flawed tests and training leakage. We recommend SWE-bench Pro.

OpenAI Blog.title: OpenAI announces Frontier Alliance Partners
OpenAI Blog.summary: OpenAI announces Frontier Alliance Partners to help enterprises move from AI pilots to production with secure, scalable agent deployments.

OpenAI Blog.title: Our First Proof submissions
OpenAI Blog.summary: We share our AI model’s proof attempts for the First Proof math challenge, testing research-grade reasoning on expert-level problems.

Hugging Face Blog.title: Deploying Open Source Vision Language Models (VLM) on Jetson
GGML and llama.cpp join HF to ensure the long-term progress of Local AI
Train AI models with Unsloth and Hugging Face Jobs for FREE

TechCrunch AI.title: Jack Dorsey just halved the size of Block’s employee base — and he says your company is next
TechCrunch AI.summary: Jack Dorsey has long been an open admirer of Elon Musk. Now, it seems, he may have been taking notes.

TechCrunch AI.title: Anthropic CEO stands firm as Pentagon deadline looms
TechCrunch AI.summary: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei said Thursday that he "cannot in good conscience accede" to the Pentagon's demands to give the military unrestricted access to its AI systems.

TechCrunch AI.title: So, we’re getting Prada Meta AI glasses, right?
TechCrunch AI.summary: Mark Zuckerberg was at Prada's fashion week event in Milan, leaving everyone to wonder if we're getting Meta AI glasses under the Prada brand.

TechCrunch AI.title: Sophia Space raises $10M seed to demo novel space computers
TechCrunch AI.summary: The company's modular computer tiles offer a new vision for space data centers.

TechCrunch AI.title: Mistral AI inks a deal with global consulting giant Accenture
TechCrunch AI.summary: Mistral AI lands a partnership with Accenture, the consultant that has also recently announced partnerships with rivals OpenAI and Anthropic.

TechCrunch AI.title: Read AI launches an email-based ‘digital twin’ to help you with schedules and answers
TechCrunch AI.summary: Read AI is launching Ada, which can reply with your availability and extract answers from the company knowledge base and the web.

TechCrunch AI.title: Bumble adds AI-powered photo feedback and profile guidance tools
TechCrunch AI.summary: Bumble and other popular dating apps, like Match Group's Tinder and Hinge, have all embraced AI-powered features.

TechCrunch AI.title: Google launches Nano Banana 2 model with faster image generation
TechCrunch AI.summary: Google is making Nano Banana 2 a default model in Gemini app and in AI mode.

TechCrunch AI.title: 2 days left: Lock in the best discounts for TechCrunch Disrupt 2026
TechCrunch AI.summary: Register now to secure discounts of up to $680 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 pass. Offer ends tomorrow, February 27, at 11:59 p.m. PT.

TechCrunch AI.title: Exhibit in Boston’s startup ecosystem at TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026
TechCrunch AI.summary: On June 9, over 1,000 founders, investors, and decision-makers will gather for TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026. This isn’t just foot traffic. It’s a full day of concentrated deal flow.
